General.Name: Dareway Software Co Ltd
General.Description: Dareway Software Co.,Ltd. develops and offers software solution for wisdom human society, smart government service, smart medical insurance, smart healthcare, and smart electricity application. The company offers social insurance, personnel, employment and entrepreneurship, and labor relations; AI+ collaborative office and blockchain + government services; public service, fund supervision, management, and data application; hospital core business, pharmaceutical new retail, refinement of hospital medical insurance, and health information interconnection; and electricity information collection, demand side management, electricity data analysis, and power user services solutions. Dareway Software Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Jinan, China.
General.Address: No. 300 Gangxing First Street, Jinan, China, 250100
